Infoman [Mystic Forge PvP] Knowledge Base for Armor

Message #1 le 2012-8-13 @ 4:12:22 par Eloctinar:
Hi,
I´ve created the following list of armor that we have found, (so far). Several things might change in future updates or are still missing. Some have the same name/label. To avoid confusion please make it clear which armor you mean in the PvP locker.
!!! Suggestion Rename the double armor. It gets confusing! !!!!
Do not post Weapons here. We created an extra thread: Mystic Forge PvP Â– Weapon!
Please add anything you have found and I will update the list I have going hereÂ…
This list is meant to collect data to help the devs fix bugs and exploits.
It´s always:
Armor Piece Token + Rank Token + Arcane Orb/ Crystal/ Sliver + Arcane Powder
You can obtain Arcane Powder/ Orb/ Crystal/ Sliver + Rank and Armor Piece Tokens through salvaging PvP Items with a PvP Salvage Kit. The PvP Salvage Kit can be bought for 100 Glory at each Glory Trader. The Glory Traders also sells Armor Piece Tokens (e.g. Light Boots Token etc.) for 200 Glory/each.
- ??? means I did not try/ find that yet. This is where I need your help.
- N/A means it could not be forged and is not available
- Items written in blue mean that there is a rare chance to get them
- Items written in red don´t fit in the current analysis
NOTE: Tournament Tokens are still bugged. @Devs: Racial Armor Reward intended? Can´t deposit it into PvP Locker.
Last UPDATE 31/07/2012
added Wolf tier for Light, Medium and Heavy, Dragon and Tiger to Light, fixed little changes
Light Armor
Rabbit
Arcane Orb = Country, Embroidered
Arcane Crystal = Embroidered
Arcane Sliver = N/A
Deer
Arcane Orb = Magician, Student
Arcane Crystal = Student, Devout
Arcane Sliver = Devout
Dolyak
Arcane Orb = Cabalist, Acolyte
Arcane Crystal = Acolyte (first one in PvP Locker), Dry Bones
Arcane Sliver = Dry Bones
Wolf
Arcane Orb = Conjurer´s, Priory
Arcane Crystal = Priory, Tribal, Stately
Arcane Sliver = Stately
Tiger (salvaged from Gold Tournament Reward Chest Items)
Arcane Orb = ???
Arcane Crystal = Outrider
Arcane Sliver = ???
Dragon (salvaged from Gold Tournament Reward Chest Items)
Arcane Orb = ???
Arcane Crystal = Nightmare
Arcane Sliver = ???
Tournament
Arcane Orb = ???
Arcane Crystal = Priory Garb / Fur Of Koda / Asuran only armor at one point, still bugged I guess.
Arcane Sliver = Ascalonian Clergy, Orrian (Dungeon Reward, non racial)
Medium Armor
Rabbit
Arcane Orb = Superior Studded, Seeker
Arcane Crystal = Seeker
Arcane Sliver = N/A
Deer
Arcane Orb = Swindler, Outlaw
Arcane Crystal = Outlaw, Rogue
Arcane Sliver = Rogue
Dolyak
Arcane Orb = Pirate, Duelist
Arcane Crystal = Duelist, Leather
Arcane Sliver = Leather (NOT the one in the first row)
Wolf
Arcane Orb = Commando, Noble
Arcane Crystal = Noble, Priory, rare chance of [nonameyet] Set
Arcane Sliver = [nonameyet] Set (Warhound Boots, Rivited Jacket, Devourer Handler Gloves, Need Name Mask, Mortar Team Leggins, Gunners Pauldrons)
Tournament
Arcane Orb = ???
Arcane Crystal = ???
Arcane Sliver = Inquest (no racial armor, Dungeon Reward)
Heavy
Rabbit
Arcane Orb = Worn Chain
Arcane Crystal = Worn Chain, Chain
Arcane Sliver = N/A
Deer
Arcane Orb = Worn Scale, Scale (first row in locker)
Arcane Crystal = Scale, Superior Duelist
Arcane Sliver = Superior Duelist
Dolyak
Arcane Orb = Reinforced Scale, Splint
Arcane Crystal = Splint, Pit Fighter
Arcane Sliver = Pit Fighter
Wolf
Arcane Orb = Branded, Priory
Arcane Crystal = Priory, Gladiator, Plated
Arcane Sliver = Plated
Tournament
Arcane Orb = ???
Arcane Crystal = ???
Arcane Sliver = Nobleman (Human Racial Armor)
